name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Favorite
description: This is a repository of favorite APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Fitbit
apis.description: Find your fit with Fitbits family of fitness products that help you stay motivated and improve your health by tracking your activity, exercise, food, weight and sleep.

apis.name: Spreaker
apis.description: Discover and listen to your favorite podcasts for free or sign up to create your own!

apis.name: Atlassian
apis.description: Millions of users globally rely on Atlassian products every day for improving software development, project management, collaboration, and code quality.

apis.name: Plivo
apis.description: Voice & SMS API Platform: Plivo enables businesses and developers to tap into powerful Voice and SMS capabilities without carrier lock-in.

apis.name: Microsoft Graph
apis.description: Microsoft Graph exposes multiple APIs from Office 365 and other Microsoft cloud services through a single endpoint: https://graph.microsoft.com. Microsoft Graph simplifies queries that would otherwise be more complex. You can use Microsoft Graph to: Access data from multiple Microsoft cloud services, including Azure Active Directory, Exchange Online as part of Office 365, SharePoint, OneDrive, OneNote, and Planner. Navigate between entities and relationships. Access intelligence and insights from the Microsoft cloud (for commercial users).

apis.name: RingCentral
apis.description: RingCentral, Inc. (NYSE: RNG) is a global provider of cloud enterprise unified communications and collaboration solutions. More flexible and cost-effective than legacy on-premise systems, RingCentral empowers today’s mobile and distributed workforces to be connected anywhere and on any device through voice, video, team messaging, collaboration, SMS, conferencing, online meetings, contact center, and fax. RingCentral provides an open platform that integrates with today’s leading business apps while giving customers the flexibility to customize their own workflows.

apis.name: Dezrez
apis.description: Cloud based estate agent software , sales & letting agent software, estate agent website design and property management software - Dezrez  Services
